content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0) and a furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position 39.5, -79.5) that puts items into the furnace
-  Belt group that connects the burner mining drill to the furnace

### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 117.5, -30.5), boiler (position 111.5, -32.0) and offshore pump (position 106.5, -32.5)
-  Pipe group (fluid system 220661) that connects the offshore pump to the boiler
-  Small electric poles (positions 115.5, -30.5, 111.5, -30.5, 111.5, -27.5, 115.5, -32.5, 120.5, -26.5, 112.5, -24.5) that form an electricity group

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
-  Make sure to check the inventory space before inserting items
### Errors when placing entities too far away
-  Move closer to the target position before placing an entity
### Errors when crafting items with missing sub-ingredients
-  Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available before crafting an item
### Errors when using incorrect data types
-  Ensure that the correct data types are used when calling functions, for example, integer values should be used instead of float values
### Errors when trying to extract items from an empty inventory
-  Check the inventory before trying to extract items
### Errors when trying to place entities without required items in inventory
-  Ensure that the required items are in the inventory before trying to place an entity

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent
-  Important variables:
  -  `coal`: integer, amount of coal in the inventory
  -  `copper_plate`: integer, amount of copper plate in the inventory
  -  `position`: tuple, current position of the agent
  -  `entities`: list, entities on the map
  -  `inventory`: dictionary, current inventory of the agent
